ai_greeting: Hello! I'm your AI English conversation partner. What would you like to practice today?
boost_english: Boost Your English Speaking Skills Fast with AI
practice_description: Practice with AI to improve your pronunciation, fluency, and vocabulary.
features_description: Powerful features to help you master English speaking.
feature_chat_desc: Practice English on any topic with AI.
feature_feedback: Automatic Feedback on Pronunciation, Fluency, and Vocabulary
feature_feedback_desc: Get real-time evaluation and advice from AI.
feature_scenario_desc: Practice conversations for interviews, travel, business, and more.
feature_history_desc: Review your past conversations and track your progress.
feature_voice_desc: Use your microphone to practice speaking out loud.
how_to_use_body:
1. Press the microphone button and speak in English.
2. The AI will reply in English.
3. Use the 'Show/Hide Translation' button to see the translation.
4. Select scenarios or topics to practice various conversations.
footer_description: AI-powered English conversation practice tailored for Indian learners.

faq_q1: Q: How do I start practicing English?
faq_a1: A: Click the microphone button and start speaking in English. The AI will respond to you.
faq_q2: Q: Is this app free to use?
faq_a2: A: Basic features are free. Some advanced features may require a subscription.
faq_q3: Q: Can I use this app on my smartphone?
faq_a3: A: Yes, the app is mobile-friendly and works on most modern smartphones and tablets.
faq_q4: Q: How is my privacy protected?
faq_a4: A: We take privacy seriously. Please see our Privacy Policy for details.
faq_q5: Q: Can I practice specific scenarios like job interviews or travel?
faq_a5: A: Yes, you can select different conversation modes such as Free Conversation, Job Interview, Business English, and more.
